queries: A vulgar or offensive sign for many signers, used in an insulting way.
verbLexeme: 1. Of a deaf person, to be educated without the benefit of sign language and to communicate by lip-reading and the mouthing of speech alone. English = (be) oral.
nominalLexeme: 1. A deaf person who has been educated without the benefit of sign language and who has been taught using a method which encourages the use of speech alone.
